user.title: Connect to Ollama Vision
user.description: Enter the details to connect to your Ollama Vision model.

text_model.title: Text Model Configuration
text_model.description: Enter the details for your Ollama Text model.

init.title: Ollama Vision Options
init.description: Adjust your Ollama Vision integration settings.

text_model_options.title: Text Model Options
text_model_options.description: Enter the details for your Ollama Text model.

analyze_image.name: Analyze Image
analyze_image.description: Send an image to Ollama for analysis and create a sensor with the result. Optionally elaborate the description with a text model.

image_url.name: Image URL
image_url.description: URL of the image to analyze.

prompt.name: Vision Prompt
prompt.description: Prompt to send to Ollama vision model with the image.

image_name.name: Image Name
image_name.description: Unique name for this image (used for sensor naming).

device_id.name: Configuration
device_id.description: Pick the Ollama Vision device to use for this analysis. A device represents a specific vision and text model.

use_text_model.name: Use Text Model
use_text_model.description: Whether to use the text model to elaborate on the vision model's description.

text_prompt.name: Text Prompt
text_prompt.description: Prompt template for the text model. See the default template to learn how to reference the vision model's output.

vision_temperature.name: Creativity Level (Vision)
vision_temperature.description: Controls randomness and creativity in vision model responses (0.0-2.0). Lower values make the model more focused, higher values increase creativity.

vision_top_p.name: Response Variety (Vision)
vision_top_p.description: Controls diversity of responses (0.0-1.0). Lower values produce more focused outputs, higher values allow more variety.

vision_top_k.name: Token Selection Limit (Vision)
vision_top_k.description: Limits the number of tokens considered at each step (1-100). Lower values make responses more focused.

vision_repeat_penalty.name: Repetition Control (Vision)
vision_repeat_penalty.description: Penalizes repetitive text (0.0-2.0). Values above 1.0 discourage repetition.

vision_seed.name: Random Seed (Vision)
vision_seed.description: Set a specific seed for reproducible results. Use 0 for random results.

vision_num_predict.name: Max Response Length (Vision)
vision_num_predict.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate. Use -1 for unlimited.
